sentence.Network_en: We should distinguish it into macroscopical and microcosmic labor axiology.
sentence.Network_cn: 只有自觉地将劳动价值论区分为宏观和微观两部分,才能明确劳动价值论一系列基本结论的前提条件,才能廓清价值规律的适用范围和操作领域.

sentence.Network_en: Information axiology is the labor theory of value of information age.
sentence.Network_cn: 信息价值论是信息时代的劳动价值论.

sentence.Network_en: Axiology of new factor of production is axiology of phenomenal configuration element.
sentence.Network_cn: 新生产要素价值论是现象形态要素价值论.

PerfectNetExp.abs: “价值论（axiology）是继存在论（ontology，旧译“本体论”）、意识论（gnosiology，旧译“认识论”）之后形成、且与之在同等层次上 …
作为价值学 （axiology）研究对象的“价值”，其现实形态是极其多样的。美国哲学家培里将价值概括为道德、宗教、艺术、科学、经 …

list.abs: on this foundation , point out value theory is abided by from " labor theory of value " to " labor knowledge axiology " , arrive again " intellectual axiology " development rule .在此基础上，指出价值理论遵循从“劳动价值论”到“劳动知识价值论”，再到“知识价值论”的发展规律。

in bound of theory of socialistic each country , people all the value theory Marxism economics is mere end is labor theory of value , and from this the effectiveness axiology of critically west .在社会主义各国理论界，人们均把马克思主义经济学的价值理论仅仅归结为劳动价值论，并由此批判西方的效用价值论。
